00004 package newtonERP.common;
00005 
00006 import java.net.MalformedURLException;
00007 import java.net.URL;
00008 import java.net.URLClassLoader;
00009 
00010 import newtonERP.module.exception.ModuleException;
00011 import newtonERP.serveur.ConfigManager;
00012 
00017 public class ModuleLoader
00018 {
00019         private static URLClassLoader loader = null;
00020 
00021         private static void initialise() throws MalformedURLException
00022         {
00023                 URL urls[] = new URL[1];
00024                 urls[0] = new URL("file:"
00025                                 + ConfigManager.loadStringProperty("modulesPath"));
00026 
00027                 loader = new URLClassLoader(urls);
00028         }
00029 
00036         public static Class<?> loadClass(String className)
00037         {
00038                 try
00039                 {
00040                         if (loader == null)
00041                                 initialise();
00042 
00043                         return loader.loadClass(className);
00044                 } catch (Exception e)
00045                 {
00046                         e.printStackTrace();
00047                         throw new ModuleException(
00048                                         "une erreur inconnue est survenue en tentant de charg√© la classe "
00049                                                         + className);
00050                 }
00051         }
00052 
00053 }
